trustfund: TF024598-INFODEV-NAT'L INFO. INFRASTRUCTURE,TF025498-PHRD-BASIC EDUCATION II PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The second basic education project for
            Panama development objectives will remain unchanged. Thus
            the additional financing will continue to support the
            project's key development objectives, including: (i)
            improving the quality and efficiency of basic education;
            (ii) improving equity of access to preschool and basic
            education; (iii) expanding coverage of preschool and early
            childhood education; and (iv) strengthening the planning,
            supervision and policy-making capacity of the Ministry of Education.
